selected_for_growth.decision_rationale: High maturity, low risk, and positive initial feedback. Ready for general availability.
success_criteria: No reported UI regressions in Dashboard
selected_for_growth.estimated_roi: Improved user retention via better feedback visualization.

hold_for_growth.reason: Technical implementation incomplete. Needs dedicated engineering focus on Worker messaging protocol.
Awaiting infrastructure decisions and backend capacity.
hold_for_growth.unblock_condition: Backend team availability and architectural approval.

executive_summary.estimated_impact: Full rollout of Intonation Heatmaps will provide all users with better pedagogical feedback.
executive_summary.resource_commitment: 5 hours for immediate rollout and verification.
key_risks: Synchronization issues in future worker implementation
